warscrolls.name: Askurgan Trueblades
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/8), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Gut-wrenching Howl
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit’s **Curseblood** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Creed of the Askurga Renkai
abilities.effect:
Subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks made by enemy **MONSTERS** that target this unit.

Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by this unit that target enemy **MONSTERS**.

warscrolls.name: Barrow Guard
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Guardians of the King
abilities.effect: While any friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS INFANTRY HEROES** are within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Barrow Knights
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Knights of the King
abilities.effect: While any friendly **DEATHRATTLE CAVALRY HEROES** are within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Cursed To Rise Once More
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.effect: You can return 1 slain model to this unit.

warscrolls.name: Belladamma Volga, First of the Vyrkos
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (2), Cavalry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: First of the Vyrkos
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of friendly **Radukar the Wolf**, **Radukar the Beast**, **Ivya Volga**, **Lady Annika** and **Kritza** units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.

abilities.name: Wolfguard
abilities.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly **Dire Wolves** unit:

• This unit has **WARD (4+)**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly **Dire Wolves** unit within this unit’s combat range after the damage sequence for this unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Under a Killing Moon
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 visible friendly **Dire Wolves** units wholly within 18" of this unit to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn:
• Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons (including **Companion** weapons).
• The targets can ignore the effect of the ‘Beast’ ability.

warscrolls.name: Blades of the Hollow King
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Retribution or Salvation
abilities.declare: This unit can cast this spell while its **Cado Ezechiar** is on the battlefield. Pick a visible unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If the target is an enemy unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on it. If the target is a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit, subtract 1 from wound rolls for combat attacks that target that unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Aurelias
abilities.declare: This unit can use this ability while its **Aurelias** is on the battlefield.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following to apply for the rest of the turn:

• Add 1 to this unit’s power level.
•  Each time a casting roll is made for this unit, you can re-roll 1 of the dice.

abilities.name: Solia, The Tutor
abilities.declare: This unit can use this ability while its **Cado Ezechiar** is on the battlefield.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following to apply for the rest of the turn:

• This unit has **WARD (5+)**.
• This unit’s **Ezechiarian Greatsword** has **Crit (Mortal)**.

warscrolls.name: Blood Knights
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Riders of Ruin
abilities.effect: When this unit moves, it can pass through models in enemy **INFANTRY** units and can pass through the combat ranges of enemy **INFANTRY** units, but it cannot end a move in combat unless specified in the ability used.

abilities.name: Trampled to Dust
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Bloodseeker Palanquin
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Wails of the Damned
abilities.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: A Promising Concoction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **VAMPIRE** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Cado Ezechiar, The Hollow King
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Retribution or Salvation
abilities.declare: Pick a visible unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
If the target is an enemy unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on it.

If the target is a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit, subtract 1 from wound rolls for combat attacks that target that unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Court of the Lost
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn.

• This unit has a Move characteristic of 12".
• Add 1 to casting rolls, unbinding rolls and banishment rolls for this unit.
• This unit’s melee weapons have **Crit (Mortal)**.

warscrolls.name: Corpse Cart
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Locus of Undeath
abilities.effect: Melee weapons used by other friendly **DEADWALKERS** units have **Crit (Auto-wound)** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Coven Throne
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Tactical Insight
abilities.effect: Friendly **DEATHRATTLE** and **DEADWALKERS** units have **WARD (5+)** while they are wholly within 6" of this unit.

abilities.name: A Promising Concoction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **VAMPIRE** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Scrying Pool
abilities.effect: If a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Redeploy’ command, you can pick another friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit that has not used a command this phase to use the ‘Redeploy’ command immediately after the first has been resolved (this is an exception to Commands, 1.2). No command point is spent the second time that command is used.

warscrolls.name: Cursed Sepulchre
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Leeching Soil
abilities.effect: Each time a model (friendly or enemy) is slain while it is within 9" of this terrain feature, **Heal (1)** this terrain feature.

abilities.name: Locus of Shyish
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** casts a **SUMMON SPELL** from the ‘Manifestations of the Grave’ lore, you can measure the range and visibility from this terrain feature instead.

warscrolls.name: Deadwalker Zombies
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Mindless Ferocity
abilities.effect: Each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. On a 6+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Deathrattle Skeletons
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Skeleton Legion
abilities.effect: You can return D3 slain models to this unit.

warscrolls.name: Dire Wolves
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Champion (1/10), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: On The Hunt
abilities.effect: This unit can use a **RUN** ability and still use **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.

warscrolls.name: Fell Bats
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Fleet and Fell
abilities.effect: This unit can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by **RETREAT** abilities.

warscrolls.name: Gorslav the Gravekeeper
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Keeper of the Corpse-gardens
abilities.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly **Deadwalker Zombies** unit:

• This unit has **WARD (4+)**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly **Deadwalker Zombies** unit within this unit’s combat range after the damage sequence for this unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Arise! Arise!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared the ‘Endless Legions’ ability and picked a friendly Deadwalkers unit to be the target
abilities.effect: When resolving the effect of the ‘Endless Legions’ ability, set up the replacement unit wholly within 3" of this unit instead of wholly within 12" and more than 3" from all enemy units instead of more than 9", even if it is not your movement phase. The replacement unit can still use **CHARGE** abilities this turn.

warscrolls.name: Hand of Nagash
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Inescapable Reach
abilities.declare: This **MANIFESTATION** can only use this ability if it has not been set up this turn.
abilities.effect: Remove this **MANIFESTATION** from the battlefield and set it up anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, roll a D3. On a 2+, this **MANIFESTATION** can move a number of inches equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Chill Grasp
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 4+, the following effects apply until the start of your next turn:

•  While the target is within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION**, the target has a maximum control score of 1 that cannot be modified.
•  While the target is within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION**, the target cannot use **MOVE** abilities.

warscrolls.name: Ivya Volga, The Outcast
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Total Dominance
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy **MONSTERS** while they are within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Shrieking Swarm
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Behemoth's Bane
abilities.effect: Subtract 2 from the Attacks characteristic of enemy **MONSTERS’** melee weapons while they are in combat with this unit.

warscrolls.name: Kosargi Nightguard
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: A Pact Maintained
abilities.effect: While a friendly **Radukar the Wolf** or **Radukar the Beast** is within this unit’s combat range, both that unit and this unit have **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Kritza, the Rat Prince
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Scurrying Retreat
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

abilities.name: The Verminous Court
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target, then pick an artefact of power that the target has.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target no longer has that artefact of power.

warscrolls.name: Lady Annika, the Thirsting Blade
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (4+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Starving Nightmare
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **lying in wait**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit wholly within enemy territory and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Kiss of the Blade Proboscian
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was allocated any damage points inflicted by this unit’s combat attacks this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Supernatural Speed
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **lying in wait**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Lauka Vai, Mother of Nightmares
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Nightmare's Miasma
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: The Queen's Dictat
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly non-**UNIQUE SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS MONSTER** wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Pick 1 of the target’s melee weapons. If the target has any **Companion** melee weapons, you must pick 1 of those. Add D3 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Impaling Talons
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is equal to or less than the target’s Health characteristic, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Mannfred von Carstein, Mortarch of Night
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

melee.name: Gheistvor, the Sword of Unholy Power

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Ashigaroth’s Claws** is 3.

abilities.name: The Mortarch of Night
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for a SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS unit wholly within 12" of this unit
abilities.effect: The unit using the ‘Redeploy’ command can move into combat when using that ability.

abilities.name: Wind of Death
abilities.declare: Pick a point on the battlefield within 18" of the caster, pick up to 3 enemy units within 6" of that point and visible to the caster to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Ashigaroth's Hunger
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit has **STRIKE‑FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Sword of Unholy Power
abilities.effect: If this unit has slain any enemy models this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **DEATHRATTLE** and **DEADWALKERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Mortis Engine
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Wave of Power
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 10" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the value of this unit’s **stored energy dice**. Then, change the value of the **stored energy dice** back to 1.

abilities.name: Nexus of Death Energy
abilities.effect: When a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit is picked to be the target of the ‘Deathly Invocation’ ability, add D3 to the number of damage points that can be healed or the combined Health characteristic of models that can be returned.

abilities.name: The Reliquary
abilities.effect: When this unit is set up for the first time, place a **stored energy dice** beside it with the ‘1’ facing up. Each time a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** successfully casts a spell while it is within 12" of this unit, increase the value of the **stored energy dice** beside this unit by 1 (to a maximum of 6).

warscrolls.name: Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (9), Fly, Ward (5+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, subtract 3 from its power level.

abilities.name: Hand of Dust
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **HERO** or **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Hide a dice in one of your hands or under one of two appropriate containers. Your opponent must pick one of your hands or containers. If they pick the one hiding the dice, this ability has no effect. If they pick the empty one, the target is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Supreme Lord of the Undead
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO** non-**UNIQUE DEATH** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit identical to the target wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Invocation of Nagash
abilities.declare: This unit can cast this spell more than once per phase. Pick a visible unit wholly within 18" of this unit that has not been picked to be the target of this spell this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
If the target is an enemy unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on it. If the target is a friendly **DEATH** unit, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Return a number of slain models to the target unit with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3.
• The target has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: The Staff of Power
abilities.effect: Add 2 to casting rolls for this unit while it has not miscast any spells this turn. If this unit miscasts a spell, ignore the restriction that would stop this unit from casting any more spells this turn.

warscrolls.name: Necromancer
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Undead Minions
abilities.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit:

• This unit has **WARD (4+)**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit within this unit’s combat range after the damage sequence for this unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Vanhel's Danse Macabre
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. After the first is used, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Neferata, Mortarch of Blood
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Nagadron’s Claws** is 3.

abilities.name: Dark Mist
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly non‑**MONSTER SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for the target (positive and negative) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Twilight's Allure
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** units while they are wholly within 6" of this unit.

abilities.name: The Mortarch of Blood
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **DEATHRATTLE INFANTRY** or **DEADWALKERS INFANTRY** units to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Each target can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: The Adevore
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** that was allocated any damage points inflicted by this unit’s **Akmet-har** this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, the target is automatically destroyed.

warscrolls.name: Prince Vhordrai
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Shordemaire’s Claws** is 5.

abilities.name: Quickblood
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Trail of Crimson
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: This unit can make a pile-in move (even if it is not in combat). Then, if this unit is in combat, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Saint of Slaughter
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**MONSTER VAMPIRE** unit that destroyed a unit this turn using a **FIGHT** ability and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the battle:

• Add 2" to the target’s Move characteristic.
• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.
• Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

More than 1 effect can apply to a unit at the same time; however, each effect can only be applied to a unit once.

warscrolls.name: Radukar the Beast
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Armour of the Night
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks that target this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Beast Will Out
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, it can move D6". It can move into combat.

abilities.name: Call to the Hunt
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **DEATHRATTLE** and **DEADWALKERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Radukar the Wolf
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Master of the Pack
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, you can re-roll charge rolls for friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Call to the Hunt
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **DEATHRATTLE** and **DEADWALKERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Revenant Draconith
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Draconic Claws** is 5.

abilities.name: Loathsome Descent
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **high above the battlefield**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Red Ruin
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+, resolve the following effects:
•  Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
•  **Heal (X)** this unit where **X** is an amount equal to the roll.
•  This unit can be removed from the battlefield and set up in reserve **high above the battlefield**.

abilities.name: Death on Tattered Wings
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **high above the battlefield**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Sanguine Swarm
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Leeching Bites
abilities.effect: Each time an attack made by this **MANIFESTATION** scores a critical hit, **Heal (1)** this **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect:
When a number of damage points equal to this **MANIFESTATION**’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this **MANIFESTATION** is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

Each time this **MANIFESTATION** moves, both its parts must end within 9" of each other.

Each part of this **MANIFESTATION** is armed with **Leeching Bites**.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Corpse Cart
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Necromantic Goad
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Deadwalker Zombies** unit that is wholly within 12" of this unit and not in combat to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target can move up to 3". It can move into combat.

abilities.name: Unholy Lodestone
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Deadwalker Zombies** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, while the target is wholly within 12" of this unit, its ‘Mindless Ferocity’ ability inflicts mortal damage on rolls of 5+ instead of 6+.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Sekhar, Fang of Nulahmia
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Irresistible Demand
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **HERO** within 18" of this unit to be the target. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on each other enemy unit within 3" of the target.

abilities.name: Allow Me to Remind You...
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, that command has no effect, it still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use it are still lost.

abilities.name: Lest You Forget...
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round, Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL or CHARGE ability for a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit
abilities.effect: Pick 1 dice from the charge roll or casting roll for that ability. Your opponent must re-roll that dice.

warscrolls.name: Sekhar, Fang of Nulahmia
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Serpentine Agility
abilities.effect: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack that targets this unit is 1-4, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.

abilities.name: The Time-Swallower's Maw
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: This unit cannot use the ‘Serpentine Agility’ ability for the rest of the battle. Roll 2D6 for each target. If the roll exceeds the target’s Move characteristic, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the difference between the roll and its Move characteristic.

abilities.name: Death's Construction
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, while they are wholly within 6" of this unit, friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** units cannot be picked to be the target of abilities used by the target other than **FIGHT** abilities.

warscrolls.name: Terrorgheist
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Skeletal Talons** is 4.

abilities.name: Sonic Assault
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice for each model in the target unit.

If 3 or more of the dice have the same value, for the rest of the turn, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST**.

If 6 or more of the dice have the same value, for the rest of the turn, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** and the target cannot use commands.

abilities.name: Gaping Maw
abilities.effect: Each time an attack made with this unit’s **Fanged Maw** scores a critical hit, that attack inflicts 6 mortal damage on the target unit and the attack sequence ends.

warscrolls.name: The Crimson Court
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Wizard (1), Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Come Then, Amuse Us
abilities.effect:
If this unit is in combat with any enemy **HEROES**, roll a D3 and then pick a number of effects from the list below equal to the roll:

• Add 1 to save rolls for this unit for the rest of the turn.
• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.
• Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: The Exiled Dead
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Unfeeling Fortitude
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Deintalos the Exile
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Deintalos the Exile** is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**. While this unit’s **Prentice Marcov** is on the battlefield, add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

warscrolls.name: The Sepulchral Guard
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Restless Dead
abilities.effect: You can return D3 slain models to this unit.

warscrolls.name: The Sons of Velmorn
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Rise Again
abilities.effect: If this unit’s **King Morlak Velmorn** is on the battlefield, roll a dice for each slain model from this unit. On a 4+, you can return 1 slain model to this unit.

warscrolls.name: Torgillius the Chamberlain
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Failing Fortitude
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s attacks.

abilities.name: Trusted Lieutenant
abilities.effect: This unit can use the ‘Deathly Invocation’ ability even if a different friendly unit has already used it this turn, but units that have already been picked to be targets of that ability this turn cannot be picked to be targets.

warscrolls.name: Unholy Reliquary
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Draw on Power
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS HERO** wholly within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following:

• **Heal (D3)** the target.
• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn and banish this **MANIFESTATION**.

warscrolls.name: Vampire Lord
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Sanguine Blur
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy non-**HERO** units and more than 3" from all enemy **HEROES**.

warscrolls.name: Vampire Lord on Nightmare Steed
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Cavalry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: 'For Glory! For Blood!'
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a CHARGE ability for this unit
abilities.effect: You can re-roll the charge roll for that **CHARGE** ability. Then, before the charge move is made, you can pick a friendly **Blood Knights** unit that is not in combat, is wholly within 12" of this unit and has not used a **CHARGE** ability this turn to be the target. If this unit charges, then, immediately after the **CHARGE** ability used by this unit has been resolved, the target can immediately use the ‘Charge’ ability even if it is not your charge phase. In addition, you can re-roll charge rolls for the target this phase.

abilities.name: Strike At The Heart
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Blood Knights** unit that charged this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that unit’s **Templar Weapons** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Vampire Lord on Zombie Dragon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Draconic Claws** is 5.

abilities.name: That Which Should Not Be
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Bloodthirsty Dominance
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the target’s Health characteristic. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Vargheists
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Death's Descent
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Vargskyr
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Bounding Haste
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3. In addition, when this unit uses a **CHARGE** ability, it can pass through terrain features and enemy models as if it had **FLY**.

warscrolls.name: Vengorian Lord
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Festering Feast
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.effect: If any damage points were allocated to enemy units by this unit’s attacks this turn, **Heal (D3)** this unit and each other friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS MONSTER** unit wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Nightmare's Miasma
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Scything Talons
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Vyrkos Blood-born
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Cling to the Shadows
abilities.effect: While each model in this unit is within 1" of any terrain features, this unit cannot be targeted by shooting attacks unless the attacking model is within 9" of it.

abilities.name: Shadowfast
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Enemy Turn
abilities.effect: This unit can use a **MOVE** ability as if it were your movement phase.

warscrolls.name: Watch Captain Halgrim
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Disciplined Advance
abilities.effect: Each time you make a run roll for a friendly **Deathrattle Skeletons** unit wholly within 12" of this unit, you can change that roll to a 4.

abilities.name: Echoes of the Watch
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Deathrattle Skeletons** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Wight King
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: King of Shambling Bones
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target’s melee weapons have **Crit (2 Hits)** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Ancient Strategies
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO DEATHRATTLE INFANTRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Wight King on Skeletal Steed
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Immortal Conqueror
abilities.declare: Pick an objective or terrain feature within enemy territory.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly **DEATHRATTLE** units while they are wholly within 6" of that objective or terrain feature.

abilities.name: Ancient Barrow Curse
abilities.effect:
If an attack made with this unit’s **King’s Relic Weapon** scores a critical hit, the target unit becomes **cursed** for the rest of the battle. Subtract 1 from save rolls for **cursed** units even if this unit has been destroyed.

**Designer’s Note**: *Multiple enemy units can become cursed by this ability but the same enemy unit cannot become cursed more than once.*

warscrolls.name: Wight Lord on Skeletal Steed
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Lord of Trampling Bones
abilities.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **DEATHRATTLE CAVALRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Royal Companions
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO DEATHRATTLE CAVALRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Zondara's Gravebreakers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Wrest From the Realms
abilities.effect:
If this unit is in a **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** army, pick a terrain feature within 3" of this unit, then roll a dice and apply the corresponding effect. You cannot pick the same terrain feature more than once per battle.

**1 *Cruel Hope*:** No effect.

**2-4 *Cursed Flesh*:** You can return D3 slain models to this unit.

**5-6 *Borrowed Power*:** Pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS HERO** wholly within 12" of this unit that does not have an artefact of power. You can pick an artefact of power from the Soulblight Gravelords faction rules that no other friendly **HERO** has and give it to that **HERO**.

abilities.name: Zondara Rivenheart
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Zondara Rivenheart** is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**.

rules.name: Wardens of the Wolf
rules.effect: Each time 1 or more slain models are returned to a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS INFANTRY** or **BEASTS** unit wholly within 12" of a friendly **Belladamma Volga, Radukar the Wolf, Radukar the Beast, Ivya Volga, Lady Annika, Kritza, Torgillius the Chamberlain, Gorslav the Gravekeeper or Watch Captain Halgrim**, add 1 to the number of slain models returned to that unit.

rules.name: Unholy Site
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **Cursed Sepulchre** to be the target.
rules.effect: The target has **WARD (4+)** until the start of your next turn.

rules.name: The Speed of Death
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **INFANTRY VAMPIRE HERO** to be the target.
rules.effect: The target can move up to 12" and has **FLY** when it does so. It cannot end that move in combat.

rules.name: Aristocracy of the Night
rules.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **VAMPIRE** units that are not in combat and add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **VAMPIRE** units that charged in the same turn.

rules.name: Tide of Bones and Blades
rules.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **DEATHRATTLE** units that charged in the same turn for attacks that target a unit that has fewer models than the attacking unit.

rules.name: Horror Unending
rules.effect: You can pick 1 additional target when using the ‘Deathly Invocation’ ability.

rules.name: Dragged Down and Torn Apart
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
rules.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **DEADWALKERS** units in combat to be the targets.
rules.effect:
For each target:

• Make a pile-in move.
• Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

spells.name: Waste Away
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: For the rest of the turn, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

spells.name: Prison of Grief
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: The target has **STRIKE-LAST** until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Vile Transference
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit. If any enemy models were slain by this spell, **Heal (D3)** the caster.

spells.name: Summon Sanguine Swarm
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Sanguine Swarm** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect:
Set up a **Sanguine Swarm** wholly within 18" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units.
A Sanguine Swarm endless spell has 2 parts that must be set up within 9" of each other.

spells.name: Summon Unholy Reliquary
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Unholy Reliquary** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up an **Unholy Reliquary** wholly within 18" of the caster.

spells.name: Summon Hand of Nagash
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Hand of Nagash** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Hand of Nagash** wholly within 18" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Chalice of the Blood Dragon
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn

artefacts.name: Amulet of Nightmares
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 9" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, the target has **STRIKE‑LAST** this phase.

artefacts.name: Grave-sand Pendant
artefacts.effect: If this unit would be destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on it have no effect. Then, **Heal (1)** this unit. This unit cannot use this ability again for the rest of the battle.

artefacts.name: Crypt Dagger
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Inflict D6 mortal damage on the target.

artefacts.name: Crown of Cold Command
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Any Hero Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick a friendly **BARROW LEGION** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+:

• If the target is damaged, **Heal (3)** the target.
•  If the target is not damaged, return a number of slain models to it with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3.

artefacts.name: Shard of Night
artefacts.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit (positive and negative).

artefacts.name: Amulet of Graves
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
artefacts.effect: If there are fewer than 3 friendly **Cursed Sepulchres** on the battlefield, set up a **Cursed Sepulchre** on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units, more than 1" from all friendly units and more than 3" from all objectives and other terrain features.

artefacts.name: Terminus Clock
artefacts.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from casting rolls for enemy **WIZARDS** while they are within 18" of this unit.

artefacts.name: Amulet of Leeches
artefacts.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly **Dire** **Wolves** or **Fell Bats** unit:

• This unit has **WARD (5+)**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly **Dire Wolves** or **Fell** **Bats** unit within this unit’s combat range after the damage sequence for this unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

heroicTraits.name: Immortal Dedication
heroicTraits.effect:
This unit receives D3 **martial prowess tokens**. Each **martial prowess token** can be spent to do 1 of the following:

• Re-roll a hit roll for this unit.
• Re-roll a wound roll for this unit.
• Re-roll a save roll for this unit.

At the start of the next turn, remove all this unit’s **martial prowess tokens**.

heroicTraits.name: Spirit-eater
heroicTraits.effect: If any models were slain by your general this turn, **Heal (D6)** your general.

heroicTraits.name: Lord of the Arcane Aegis
heroicTraits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following keywords:

• **INFANTRY**
• **CAVALRY**
• **MONSTER**
• **BEAST**

For the rest of the battle, each time an attack targets this unit, if the attacking unit has the keyword you picked, an unmodified save roll of 4+ for that attack is always successful.

heroicTraits.name: Restless Tyrant
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **BARROW LEGION** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 2" to the target’s Move characteristic for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Unbending Will
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit that has 2 or more models and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Add D6 to the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Lash of the Sire
heroicTraits.declare: Pick another friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+:

•  If the target is not in combat, it can move D6" but cannot move into combat during any part of that move.
•  If the target is in combat, it can make a pile‑in move.

heroicTraits.name: Unhinged Rampager
heroicTraits.effect: You can re-roll charge rolls for this unit in your charge phase.

heroicTraits.name: Frightening Vitality
heroicTraits.effect: Each time an ability would heal exactly 1 or 2 of this unit’s damage points, heal 3 damage points instead.

heroicTraits.name: A Wastrel and a Vagabond
heroicTraits.effect:
While a friendly **Deadwalker Zombies** or **Deathrattle Skeletons** unit is wholly within 12" of this unit:
• Add 2 to run rolls for that unit.
• Add 3" to the distance that unit can move when it piles in.

heroicTraits.name: Immortal Ego
heroicTraits.effect: Each phase, you can re-roll 1 hit roll, 1 wound roll and 1 save roll for this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Keeper of the Royal Menagerie
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **Dire Wolves** or **Fell Bats** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

other.name: The Hunger
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
other.effect: If this unit used a **FIGHT** ability this turn, **Heal (D3)** this unit. **Heal (2D3)** this unit instead if it destroyed an enemy unit this turn using a **FIGHT** ability.

other.name: Deathless Monstrosity
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase

other.name: Cover of Night
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
other.declare: Pick 1 friendly unit in this Regiment of Renown that is not in combat to be the target.
other.effect: Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again more than 6" from all enemy units.

other.name: Engulfing Shadows
other.effect: Each time a unit in this Regiment of Renown is set up, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

other.name: Stalking Blades
other.declare: Pick the **Mannfred von Carstein** in this Regiment of Renown to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
other.effect: Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each other enemy unit within 3" of the target.

other.name: The Blood Queen's Will
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), End of Any Turn
other.declare: Pick an enemy unit contesting an objective that the **Neferata** in this Regiment of Renown is contesting to be the target.
other.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2-5, subtract 10 from the control score of the target for the rest of the turn. On a 6, the target has a maximum control score of 1 for the rest of the turn.

other.name: Premeditated Demise
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
other.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of the **Neferata** in this Regiment of Renown to be the target.
other.effect: Until the start of your next turn, ward rolls cannot be made for damage points inflicted on the target by attacks made by units in this Regiment of Renown.

other.name: Soulpike
other.declare: Pick the **Neferata** in this Regiment of Renown to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
other.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the target uses a **CHARGE** ability, immediately after that ability has been resolved, roll a number of dice equal to the unmodified charge roll for that ability. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

other.name: Vitiating Vapours
other.effect: Subtract 1 from ward rolls for enemy units while they are within 12" of the **Corpse Cart** in this Regiment of Renown.

other.name: Legend Among Graverobbers
other.declare: Pick the **Corpse Cart** in this Regiment of Renown to use this ability if it is within 3" of the **Deadwalker Zombies** unit in this Regiment of Renown. Then, pick each enemy **INFANTRY**, **CAVALRY** and **BEAST** unit within 12" of the **Corpse Cart** to be the targets.
other.effect: For each target that had any models slain this turn, you can return D3 slain models to the **Deadwalker Zombies** unit in this Regiment of Renown.

battleTraits.name: Carve A Bloody Path
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **Blood Knights** unit that is in combat to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: That unit can use a **CHARGE** ability even though it is in combat and even if it has already used a **CHARGE** ability this turn.

battleTraits.name: From A Quarter Unseen
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Movement Phase
battleTraits.declare: You cannot use this ability in the first battle round. Pick each friendly unit that is **in the Crimson Keep** to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Set up each target wholly within 9" of the battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units. If you set up any units using this ability in the third or a subsequent battle round, do not spend any command points when using the ‘Carve a Bloody Path’ command this turn.

battleTraits.name: Blood Rampage
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CRIMSON KEEP MONSTER** that is in combat and has not used any **RAMPAGE** abilities this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
This unit can make a move of 2D6". It must end that move in combat with the target unit. Then, roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target unit’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

After this ability has been resolved, this unit cannot use **RAMPAGE** abilities for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: The Crimson Keep
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CRIMSON KEEP** unit that has not been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit in reserve **in the Crimson Keep**. It has now been deployed. You cannot set up more friendly units **in the Crimson Keep** than there are on the battlefield.

battleTraits.name: All to Dust
battleTraits.effect: In the third and subsequent battle rounds, while a friendly **Cursed Sepulchre** is on the battlefield, subtract 1 from save rolls for enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Grave Sentinels
battleTraits.effect: The melee weapons used by friendly **BARROW LEGION** units have **Anti-charge (+1 Rend)** while they are wholly within 9" of a friendly **Cursed Sepulchre**.

battleTraits.name: Endless Legions of Bone
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Any Movement Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-**UNIQUE BARROW LEGION** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of a friendly **BARROW LEGION HERO** or wholly within 6" of a friendly **Cursed Sepulchre**. It must be set up more than 9" from all enemy units.

If it is your movement phase, you can set up the replacement unit more than 3" from all enemy units instead of more than 9", but if you set it up within 9" of any enemy units, it cannot use **CHARGE** abilities this turn.

battleTraits.name: Gifts to the Petty Kingdoms
battleTraits.declare: Pick up to 2 friendly non-**UNIQUE BARROW LEGION HEROES** that do not have an artefact of power to be the targets (you can pick units in reserve).
battleTraits.effect:
Give each target 1 artefact of power from the ‘Barrow Legion’ Army of Renown rules.

**Designer’s Note**: *These artefacts of power are given to the* **HEROES** *during the deployment phase, not during army composition.*

battleTraits.name: The Royal Crypt
battleTraits.declare: This ability must be used instead of the ‘Deploy Faction Terrain Feature’ ability.
battleTraits.effect: Set up 3 **Cursed Sepulchres** wholly within friendly territory, each within ½" of any of the others and more than 3" from all objectives and other terrain features. After you have done so, they have been deployed and they are considered to be a single **Cursed Sepulchre** terrain feature that has a Health characteristic of 24 instead of 8.

battleTraits.name: The Hunger
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.declare: Pick each friendly **VAMPIRE** unit that used a **FIGHT** ability this turn to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: **Heal (D3)** each target. **Heal (2D3)** the target instead if it destroyed an enemy unit this turn using a **FIGHT** ability.

battleTraits.name: The Rising Dead
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is **in the grave**.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit wholly within 6" of a friendly **Cursed Sepulchre** and more than 9" from all enemy units, or wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield, wholly within friendly territory and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Endless Legions
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Any Movement Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-**UNIQUE DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit that started the battle with 2 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS HERO** or wholly within 6" of a friendly **Cursed Sepulchre**. It must be set up more than 9" from all enemy units.

If it is your movement phase, you can set up the replacement unit more than 3" from all enemy units instead of more than 9", but if you set it up within 9" of any enemy units, it cannot use **CHARGE** abilities this turn.

battleTraits.name: The Unquiet Dead
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit that has not been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit in reserve **in the grave**. It has now been deployed. You cannot set up more friendly units **in the grave** than there are on the battlefield.

battleTraits.name: Deathly Invocation
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS HERO** to use this ability, then pick up to 3 friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** units wholly within 12" of that **HERO** to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect:
For each target:

• If the target is damaged, **Heal (3)** the target.
• If the target is not damaged, return a number of slain models to it with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3.

battleTraits.name: Ancient Burial Sites
battleTraits.effect:
If there is a friendly **Cursed Sepulchre** on the battlefield, you can set up up to 2 additional **Cursed Sepulchres** on the battlefield. The first must be set up more than 3" from all units, objectives and other terrain features. The second must be set up wholly outside enemy territory and more than 3" from all units, objectives and other terrain features.

**Designer’s Note**: *The original* **Cursed Sepulchre** *is set up in Step 1 of the deployment phase using the ‘Deploy Faction Terrain’ ability. This ability allows you to set up a second and third such terrain feature and is used in Step 3 of the deployment phase, after armies have been deployed.*

battleTraits.name: The Queen's Prize
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any **EXQUISITE PLOT** abilities this turn. Pick a friendly unit to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
For the rest of the turn, add 5 to the target’s control score.

In addition, at the end of this turn, after determining control of objectives, if the target is contesting an objective that you control and that was controlled by your opponent at the start of this turn, add 5 to the target’s control score for the rest of the battle.

battleTraits.name: Recruitment Drive
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any **EXQUISITE PLOT** abilities this turn. Pick a friendly unit to be the **hunter** and an enemy unit with 5 or more models to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to hit rolls for the **hunter**’s combat attacks that target that enemy unit. In addition, if the target is destroyed this turn by the **hunter**, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the **hunter**’s melee weapons for the rest of the battle.

battleTraits.name: Seek Worthy Blood
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any **EXQUISITE PLOT** abilities this turn. Pick a friendly unit to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, the target’s weapons have **Anti-HERO (+1 Rend)**. In addition, if the target destroys any enemy **HEROES** this turn, the target’s weapons have **Anti-HERO (+1 Rend)** for the rest of the battle.

battleTraits.name: Thaumic Realignment
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any **EXQUISITE PLOT** abilities this turn. Pick a friendly **WIZARD** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to casting rolls for the target. In addition, at the end of this turn, if the target successfully cast any spells this turn, add 1 to its power level for the rest of the battle.
